title: [Grawood Farmstead, Meadow]
description: Sections of split-rail fence create an enclosure with openings that lead to the very heart of the town.  Each post of the fence bears a flowered wreath, and greenery strewn with full and half-open blossoms is draped along the railings.  Here and there, tall poles tower above, supporting banners that move with even the most subtle of winds.
paths: Obvious paths: northeast, southeast, southwest, northwest
room.location: Grawood Farmstead outside of River's Rest
